name: GallerySecurityTextPositionType
shortdesc: The position of the text displayed over gallery images as an antitheft deterrent.

property.name: CENTERED
property.shortdesc: Text is centered on each image.

property.name: UPPERLEFT
property.shortdesc: Text is in the upper left corner of each image.

property.name: LOWERLEFT
property.shortdesc: Ltext is in the lower left corner of each image.

property.name: UPPERRIGHT
property.shortdesc: Text is in the upper right corner of each image.

property.name: LOWERRIGHT
property.shortdesc: Text is in the lower right corner of each image.
